activities: Gamblit Gaming, LLC collects on-line and off-line identification data and uses the data to verify customer identities and to prevent fraud and other illegal activity.  This data includes personal identification information which customers manually provide and personal identification information that is provided to Gamblit Gaming, LLC through approved third parties, following the consent of the customer.
contactoff1: 700 N Central Ave, Suite 700, Glendale, CA 91203
personaldata: Our Safe Harbor Privacy Notice covers all applicable customer data (off-line, on-line, manual process, etc.).
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
